column6: THE CURSE OF VICTORY! ROBBIE REYES may have broken free of the KILLISEUM races but what at what terrifying cost? What is the fate of the other racers JOHNNY BLAZE, DANNY KETCH, ALEJANDRA BLAZE, SLADE and ZERO COCHRANE after their betrayal to ARCADE? Can anyone truly win on the TRACK OF TREACHERY?
column8: | penciller (cover):Francesco Francavilla | artist:Juan Gedeon | writer:Felipe Smith
